FreeCrimeStats.com is a free service provided by Protect America Inc. to find local crime statistics about burglary, robbery, motor vehicle theft, violent crime, and larceny. Free Crime Stats is dedicated to informing people of the crime in their area no matter where they live in the United States. Start your search with Free Crime Stats and be aware of the crime in your neighborhood.

To get more information on how Protect America Inc. and Free Crime Stats can help make your neighborhood and home a bit safer, contact us at freecrimestats@protectamerica.com .

Free Crime Stats provides the information below for free!

  • Burglary Stats
  • Robbery Stats
  • Motor Vehicle Stats
  • Violent Crime Stats
  • Larceny Stats
  • Home Security Advice
